thread.title: This alarm clock makes your coffee for you | www.palmbeachpost.com
thread.title_full: This alarm clock makes your coffee for you | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: palmbeachpost
title: This alarm clock makes your coffee for you | www.palmbeachpost.com
text:
Sometimes, getting your day started is the hardest part of the day. A lot of people can’t even function until they’ve had a daily dose of coffee.
Behold the Barisieur .
Julius Schorzman/Wikimedia Commons Cup of coffee This state-of-the-art alarm clock will wake you up and prepare a hot cup of java at the same time. Settings allow users to adjust the time the Barisieur begins sounding an alarm and also the time it begins making the cup of joe.
>> Read more trending stories
The machine boils the water, grinds the coffee beans and pours the finished product directly into the user’s cup or mug of choice. There’s even an easily removable drawer for sugar and a compartment to hold fresh milk.
The Barisieur was created by Joshua Renouf , who graduated last year from Nottingham Trent University with a degree in industrial and product design. Unfortunately, the invention isn’t available for purchase yet, but you can send a request for the product here .
Wake up to the smell of fresh coffee http://t.co/AhyxixTnYs #coffee #morning #technology #butfirstcoffee pic.twitter.com/smL9zpcTPO
— Punchline Magazine (@PunchlineGlos) July 18, 2015
